name: Framing
Confirm area of work is accessible & acceptable to commence (If not comment below)
Setout & alignment as per drawing (include revision below)
Drawing & revision number(s)
All studs are set out correct, and are plumb level and square
All studs are installed as per manufacturer's recommendations and the BCA
External top and bottom tracks are fixed/anchored
Flashings are installed correctly, are continuous and free of any imperfections
Flashings have been left out min 150 mm over openings
All noggins are installed correctly
All sarking has been installed as per manufacturers recommendations
Penetration through fire rated wall have been treated
Door frames have been installed plumb level, square and in wind
All window and sliding door openings are as per plan and line up with above elements
All studs are level and in wind
All internal walls have been studded out and are as per plan
All internal walls comply with BCA and disabled code
Hebel has been fire caulked to the ceiling and floor
Hebel expansion joints have been installed and are consistent including slab junctions
All Hebel walls line up with elements above
Weep holes have been installed correctly and at right height
Door frames to be infilled
Insulation installed as per AS/BCA (party walls & external)
Acoustic practices to be as per Australian Standards & BCA
Final sign off - All framing work completed as per the above ITP
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
